actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

official_title: To provide for the repayment of amounts borrowed by Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac from the Treasury of the United States, together with interest, over a 30-year period, and for other purposes.
short_title: Let the GSEs Pay Us Back Act of 2013

titles.title: Let the GSEs Pay Us Back Act of 2013
To provide for the repayment of amounts borrowed by Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac from the Treasury of the United States, together with interest, over a 30-year period, and for other purposes.
